title: Nine Inch Nails - Bleedthrough
description:
The album [WITH_TEETH] was originally titled Bleedthrough.  A very cool name which was sadly tainted by tampon jokes. 

The cover image was made from a mix of the free poster graphics handed out in the [WITH_TEETH] era and a conceptual image by Rob Sheridan during the album's Bleedthrough days.  

The music was taken off of domestic and imported [WITH_TEETH] albums as well as  two studio versions of songs from the NIN/JA promo CD.  Below is the track listing.

01 . The Collector
02 . The Line Begins To Blur
03 . Not So Pretty Now
04 . The Hand That Feeds (Ruff Mix)
05 . You Know What You Are
06 . With Teeth
07 . Only
08 . Sunspots
09 . All The Love In The World
10 . Love Is Not Enough
11 . Non-Entity
12 . Home
13 . Beside You In Time
14 . Right Where It Belongs

All tracks came from a 320KBPS CBR album rip but 3 and 11, which were from high quality MP3 VBRs.  The save in OGG Vorbis was due to MP3 Variable errors and a lack of wanting to mess with it anymore when a trial OGG run was successful.  

I chose this track order for both audible and conceptual flow based on lyrical and song content.  The initial idea of dropping songs off of [WITH_TEETH] and putting in tracks from that era came from someone with the handle ZeroSum.  

Here's to hoping after a few more passes through the whole album I don't become unhappy with the track list.  And to hoping nobody is disappointed with the line-up!

p.s. I dropped Every Day Is Exactly The Same as well as Getting Smaller.  GS was suggested.  EDIETS was my additional removal.  And substituting the Ruff Mix for the original was due to my not being very fond of the original but adoring the Ruff Mix.  

Bring on HESITATION MARKS!
